definition: (classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in/at/from/because/than/(classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)
(classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in/at/from/because/than/(classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)
to care about/equivalent of 在於|在于[zai4 yu2]
due to/to stem from/to go beyond (also fig. beyond reason, expectations etc)/to go against (expectations)
a tiny bit/very little/next to nothing (idiom)
lit. isn't that a joy? (quote from Confucius)/fig. (jocularly) extremely/awfully
variant of 黑糊糊[hei1 hu1 hu1]
variant of 黑糊糊[hei1 hu1 hu1]

sentences.chinese: 隆冬之時，怎得東南風乎？

sentences.english: I can't imagine you said this is a smallish-little mistake.
sentences.chinese: 我不敢自信你說這是眇乎小哉的錯誤。
